channel.title: me on Suburban Nerd
channel.description: Recent content in me on Suburban Nerd

item.title: Introducing ... Me
item.description: Hey there, the internet is a turbulent place, and since I’ve moved around quite a few times, I think I forgot to introduce myself the last time I made the move. I am Marcus Ramberg, the writer of this blog, and director of Nordaaker, a small British/Norwegian company currently run out of Oslo, Norway. In addition to being my personal blog, at the time being this blog acts as Nordaaker’s dynamic english presence.
